page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS
page.content: The{Dewsbury 'Reporter'}is our {local paper.} It is{published}every Friday and is read by{many people}who live in Dewsbury. It is a very {interesting paper,}containing a{sports page, women's page, gardening{tips, local{news, headlines}and Births, Marriages, and Deaths{columns.}It costs{16p,}which I think is a{good {price}for a paper which contains so much. If I was asked if I wanted to change the Dewsbury 'Reporter', I wouldn't. I would keep it like it is - good,{interesting,}and{helpful.}
